description: Baseline for Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct on CUDA (bfloat16, weight-only quant) using DashInfer v2.1.0 from PyPI. Measured 2026-02-15 on H200 GPU.
source: docker: dashinfer/dev-ubuntu-cuda:latest (Ubuntu 24.04 + CUDA 12.6 + Python 3.10), dashinfer==2.1.0 from PyPI, lm_eval==0.4.11, transformers==4.57.6

reference_scores.notes: GSM8K gap (47% vs 73%) likely due to few-shot handling differences. HumanEval pass@1 (61.6%) matches official report closely.
